name: Andrélon Special shampoo oil & curl
composition: ‎Ingrediënten: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil (Buriti-olie), Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter (Murumuruboter), Hydrolyzed Keratin (Keratine), Arginine, Lysine HCl, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Gluconolactone, Trehalose, Sodium Sulfate, Dimethiconol, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Benzoate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Mica, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 42090, CI 77891.
